r.d: Memcached is a caching daemon designed especially for dynamic web applications to decrease database load by storing objects in memory. This extension allows you to work with memcached through handy OO and procedural interfaces.
r.n: - Fixed PECL bug 12494 (Segmentation fault when Exception thrown in the callback function) - Fixed PECL bug #12834 (segfault when getting duplicate array values on 64-bit system) - Changed behaviour of close() to actually remove all servers from pool (PECL bug #12555) - Added configure option for PEAR installer to disable session handler support
